articles.description: Brisbane's Lachie Neale will have surgery on an ankle injury sustained in the Lions' win over Carlton
articles.content:
BROWNLOW medallist Lachie Neale will be put under the knife on Monday to repair an ankle injury sustained in Saturday's win over Carlton.
